plot outline: Kiran is an honest and sincere inspector who gets posted in a town that has many misgivings. While he tries to set things right and also finds love, he also discovers that this is the place that has made him an orphan and he has to avenge his parents' killing.
title: Once More Kaurava
plot: Kiran is an honest and sincere inspector who gets posted in a town that has many misgivings. While he tries to set things right and also finds love, he also discovers that this is the place that has made him an orphan and he has to avenge his parents' killing.::sukanya suresh
